name: Amaranto
notes:
Onscripter: http://unclemion.com/onscripter/releases/
Tested with the DMM release: https://www.dmm.co.jp/dc/doujin/-/detail/=/cid=d_037197/

files.patch: N/A:Please select the patch archive from http://www.mediafire.com/file/x0i9d86cw3i9d73/AMARANTO+English+Patch.zip

content:
exe: AMARANTO/onscripter-en
files:
- archive: N/A:Please select the game archive
- patch: N/A:Please select the patch archive from http://www.mediafire.com/file/x0i9d86cw3i9d73/AMARANTO+English+Patch.zip
- ons: N/A:Please select the Onscripter archive
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $archive
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/AMARANTO
    file: $patch
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/AMARANTO
    file: $ons
- chmodx: $GAMEDIR/AMARANTO/onscripter-en
